== Description ==

Update an option for a particular blog.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php update_blog_option( $id, $option, $value, $deprecated ) ?>%%%
== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$id|integer|The blog id|required}}

{{Parameter|$option|string|The option key|required}}

{{Parameter|$value|mixed|The option value|required}}

{{Parameter|$deprecated|null|Deprecated parameter|optional|null}}

== Return Value ==
{{Return||boolean|True on success, false on failure.}}
